#include<iostream>
#define fastin cin.sync_with_stdio(false);cout.sync_with_stdio(false)
#include<vector>
#define pb(i) push_back(i)
#define max 1000005
using namespace std;

vector<bool> sieve(max/2+1,false);

long long sum[max];
void pre()
{
     int i,j;

     for(i=3;i*i<=max;i+=2)
     {
          if(!sieve[i>>1])
          {
              for(j=i*i;j<max;j+=2*i)
              {
                  sieve[j>>1]=true;
              }
          }
     }
     
    for(i=3;i<max;i+=2)
    {
        if(!sieve[i>>1])
           sum[i]=sum[i-2]+i;
        else
           sum[i]=sum[i-2];
    } 
    
     
}

int main()
{
    pre();
    int t,n;
    fastin;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              cin>>n;
              if(n>=2)
              {
               if(n&1)
                 cout<<sum[n-2]+2<<endl;
               else
                  cout<<sum[n-1]+2<<endl;
                  }
                  else
                  cout<<"0\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
